metadata.name: Made in Spain
metadata.summary: A series exploring the culinary and cultural riches of Spain hosted by chef Jose Andres
metadata.description: MADE IN SPAIN is a series exploring the culinary and cultural riches of Spain. Hosted by chef Jose Andres, the series highlights the extraordinary cooking traditions of a country whose food and wine is capturing the worlds' imagination.
metadata.keywords: PBS, cooking, jose andres, recipes, global food, spanish
